sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { NavigationEnd, Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-footer', templateUrl: './footer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./footer.component.scss'] }) export class FooterComponent implements OnInit { public url: any; constructor(private router: Router) { this.router.events.subscribe((event) => { if (event instanceof NavigationEnd) { this.url = event.url; } }); } ngOnInit() { } }
